title: odunybiz
author: odunybiz
created_time: August 15, 2023, 05:31:26 AMLast edit: August 15, 2023, 05:59:18 AM by odunybiz
content: Due to the presence Nigeria economy, we are really battling with a bad and unstable economy. USDT or BUSD price keep fluctuating with our unstable economy. I think one could take the advantage of this to make some money. With this, keeping USDT or BUSD can be another way to make money in the crypto space. Not up to two months now, I remember I sold my USDT around #780. Today it's now been trade around #940. Imagine, one has bought 1000 USDT or BUSD at #780 and selling now at #940. Let's calculate the profit At #780, 1000 USDT or BUSD gives #780,000At #940, 1000 USDT or BUSD gives #940,000Profit= #940,000- #780,000 = #160,000That means #160,000 will be made as profit in less than 2 months. This may look small but remember you can't lose all your money when compare to shitcoin risk. Although this doesn't come often but I think one can take the opportunity anytime the value goes down to a reasonable level. CONCLUSION: No one pray for our economy to continue this way but I don't see things being corrected easily as our government is been run on dialy basis. Now in Nigeria, buying USDT or BUSD to keep is far better than buying a shitcoin. Although it may not give much profit like those shitcoin but it can save you from shitcoin scam. No matter the case may be, you hardly can lose all your money with buying and keeping USDT or BUSD but you can easily lose more than thousands of dollars on shitcoin if good research is not made on the project you invested in.***Remember this isn't a full financial advice.***

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: Already, there are some big-time investors that have kept a huge amount in fiat, and I think it's a smart move because the NGN is losing value against USD, people can just buy USD, but the question is, what would they be doing with the USD? Rather than buying USD, the person can just keep accumulating their Bitcoin on a DCA. People who can buy your idea @OP are Nigerian investors who have a lot of money.For example, someone can have $100k, and after buying a bitcoin worth $40k, they can just decide to hold the USD instead of exchanging it for NGN, as its value will drip. But for someone who just has $10, they should just invest it in BTC because the value of Bitcoin will also grow and they might buy it at a high price with their small capital.
